data.message: Why didn’t anyone get this mad when on the song “Mosh” Eminem said “Fuck Bush” I mean it’s simple Slim has always been political but I do admit his style has changed to the point of older fans not really recognizing his new flow or lack there-of one but besides that Em has always been in your face fuck off mentality since he arrived in 1997. Next time he’ll sign your autograph “Thanks for the support, asshoe” so seriously what’s the up cry for it’s pointless.
